Cruise is looking for Data Scientists!! Our fleet brings in over 200TB of data every day and the work we are doing with that data is super exciting.  If you have been thinking about getting involved with Self Driving Cars, let's chat!!
How we’re solving the LIDAR problem – Kyle Vogt – Medium
Cruise acquires Strobe to help dramatically reduce LiDAR costs
How we’re solving the LIDAR problem – Kyle Vogt – Medium

Cruise is THE driverless car company. We’re building the world’s best autonomous vehicles to safely connect people to the places, things, and experiences they care about. Our vehicles are on the road in California, Arizona, and Michigan navigating some of the most challenging and unpredictable driving environments. We're looking for smart, ambitious people to help build the world's largest fleet of driverless cars. We strive to build a team of curious, intelligent, and driven individuals from all background and levels of experience. We're making history. We build our own destiny. We do not make excuses. There isn’t always an expert to guide us (one might not even exist), but we take ownership and find a way. Join us.I am looking for passionate C++ engineers from every industry to come help us solve the incredibly difficult problem of building a fully self driving vehicle.
Technical Sourcer - laid off in reduction of force

- Built pipeline for Backend Python/Django candidates - Contributed to iOS pipeline for mobile team resulting in two recruiter screens- Took over @postmatesdev twitter account increasing the social presence of our engineering team- Built team pipeline tracking spreadsheets to move to a more data driven recruiting approach

- Full Desk Recruiting, bringing in new business and matching Sales, Marketing and Product talent - 165% to quota in 6 month ramp period- Sourcing, screening, being a liaison between hiring managers and candidates through deal close

Recruiting___________________________________________- Full cycle recruiting for 15 requisitions in Marketing, Operations, and Engineering.- Increased company size from 45 to 75 full time employees. - Partnered with CEO and Senior Leadership to develop quarterly hiring plans and priorities.- Owned offer letter and salary negotiation process.- Created a new-hire employee onboarding document to showcase the company culture and  experience.- Implemented ATS and recruiting workflow. HR/Office Management___________________________________________- Negotiated and implemented employee benefits, including yearly renewals and open enrollment.- Utilized outside attorneys to acquire TN, OPT, H1-B visas for all foreign employees.- Maintained company compliance with state and federal laws.- Managed day to day office operations – in-office snacks, team lunches, happy hours,  perks, employee satisfaction.- Established a company culture committee to discuss and address culture needs- Single point of contact for all 3rd party vendors.- Organized an office move including engaging with brokers, touring space, negotiating LOI and leases.- Developed, implemented, and maintained company policies and procedures including a maternity/paternity leave policy. - Managed process in a 25% company reduction in force..- Worked with insurance brokers to acquire workers comp insurance after being issued a notice of non-renewal. - Stabilized company culture after layoffs to reduce attrition.
